meta.description: Prompt engineering templates, variables, style guidelines, and industry-specific customizations

master_image_prompt_template.description: Core image generation prompt structure with 9 integrated components

components.name: subject
components.description: Primary subject, composition, and focal point
components.example: Experienced plumber in professional uniform working on copper pipe installation

components.name: style
components.description: Visual style, medium, and artistic direction
components.example: Photorealistic professional photography style, clean modern aesthetic

components.name: mood
components.description: Emotional tone, atmosphere, and psychological impact

components.name: composition
components.description: Visual framing, layout, and spatial arrangement
components.example: Rule of thirds composition with subject in left frame, detail work in sharp focus

components.name: lighting
components.description: Light quality, direction, intensity, and mood creation
components.example: Warm natural diffused sunlight with subtle shadows, highlighting professional competence

components.name: color_palette
components.description: Primary colors, accents, and brand alignment
components.example: Warm earth tones with professional blue accents (#3b82f6), clean color grading

components.name: technical_requirements
components.example: 2K resolution (1696x2528), 2:3 aspect ratio, premium quality, suitable for hero section

components.name: brand_context
components.description: Brand values, messaging, and visual identity
components.example: Professional trades company branding, reliability focus, Australian context

components.name: avoid_list
components.example: Avoid generic stock imagery, avoid poor safety practices, avoid dated aesthetics

master_image_prompt_template.complete_template: Create a {style} image of {subject}. The composition should {composition}. Lighting should be {lighting} to emphasize {mood}. Use a {color_palette} color palette with {accent_color} accents, aligned with {brand_context}. Technical specs: {technical_requirements}. IMPORTANT - Avoid: {avoid_list}

hero_section.name: Hero Section Image
hero_section.purpose: Large impact, brand statement, above-the-fold visibility
hero_section.prompt_modifier: Create an impactful, attention-grabbing image for hero section. Composition should draw eye to center with clear visual hierarchy. Strong lighting contrast to create depth. Vibrant colors with brand accent prominence.

product_demo.name: Product/Service Demonstration
product_demo.purpose: Show actual product or service in action with clear context
product_demo.prompt_modifier: Product-focused image showing actual service delivery or product quality. Center composition on product/service with context elements. Detail-sharp focus on product area. Professional, trustworthy atmosphere.

variables.action_context: Service being delivered or product being used

testimonial_portrait.name: Testimonial/Client Portrait
testimonial_portrait.purpose: Build trust through authentic client representation
testimonial_portrait.prompt_modifier: Professional portrait of satisfied client/user. Composition: subject fills frame with slight headroom. Warm, approachable lighting. Friendly professional atmosphere suggesting reliability and satisfaction.

industry_card.name: Industry-Specific Service Card
industry_card.purpose: Represent specific trade/service category with visual clarity
industry_card.prompt_modifier: Industry-specific service visual for card display. Clear service identification. Professional tradesperson in action. Brand colors prominent. Composition suitable for 1:1 square format.

blog_featured.name: Blog Post Featured Image
blog_featured.purpose: Engage readers, support article topic, SEO enhancement
blog_featured.composition_focus: Topic-relevant, visually interesting, readable with text overlay
blog_featured.prompt_modifier: Blog featured image aligned with article topic. Composition supports text overlay with 40% left/right margins clear. Visually interesting, on-brand, high shareability.

process_step.name: Process Step/How-To Image
process_step.purpose: Illustrate sequential process or how-to content
process_step.composition_focus: Step clarity, action visible, sequential context
process_step.prompt_modifier: Specific process step visualization. Single action/moment in sequence. Clear, step-by-step appropriate. Detail sharp on key action point.

cta_support.name: Call-to-Action Support Image
cta_support.purpose: Encourage user action with compelling visual
cta_support.prompt_modifier: Motivational CTA support image. Shows benefit/outcome of action. Emotional resonance for desired action. Brand accent colors prominent.

hero_video.name: Hero Video

structure.description: Immediate attention grab, surprising or compelling opening
Show service/product, demonstrate value, establish benefit
Build credibility, show quality, satisfied client reaction
Clear call to action, next steps, conversion path

hero_video.prompt_guidelines: Opening must be visually striking and engaging within first 1 second. Show actual service delivery. Include satisfied client moment. End with clear CTA. Natural conversational dialogue or expert narration. Upbeat professional tone.

explainer_clip.name: Explainer Video

structure.description: Final call to action and contact information

explainer_clip.prompt_guidelines: Clear step-by-step progression. Visual variety between phases. Expert narration explaining each step. Include on-screen text for key points. Professional pacing with 1-2 second transitions. Ending with clickable CTA.

testimonial_video.name: Client Testimonial
testimonial_video.prompt_guidelines: Authentic client speaking naturally. Genuine emotion and satisfaction visible. Specific problem and solution mentioned. Measurable results if possible. Professional setting but relatable. Vertical 1:1 format for social media.

social_short.name: Social Media Short

structure.description: Stop the scroll - visual or verbal hook

social_short.prompt_guidelines: Fast-paced, vertical format. Hook in first 2 seconds. Quick cuts and transitions. Text overlays for key points. Trending audio or custom voiceover. Platform-specific formatting (TikTok, Instagram Reels, Shorts). High entertainment value.

brand_alignment: Visual style consistent with brand identity
